Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Crawling 2 or more jobs at the same time
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=284768837

Hi Guilherme,

> Is possbible to execute 2 or more jobs on heritrix 1.10.0 at the same
> time?
> If it is true, how could I do this?

This seems to work in the current Heritrix.
In the Web UI, click on "Setup" and browse to "Local instances". You can
then create a new Heritrix instance and assign Jobs to it. It seems like
they run concurrently then.

Max
